data.name: Virtual world-Digital girl
data.detailed_description:
In the future, people can have a digital partner of their own~ In the meta-universe, we can come to the virtual world and be with our digital girlfriend. The game will bring you into the virtual digital world, you and your virtual Your partner "Kaya" is in her bedroom, you can do whatever you want~Kaya will follow any arrangement you make~have 3A game experience~

You can change all kinds of sexy clothes for her~ You can also control her body to do anything. We provide a fully editable mode. In the edit mode, you can manipulate everything about her.

The game also adds a small game function, which allows you to get dozens of "special" toys ~ bring happiness to Kaya.

A rich achievement system has also been added to the game, and more achievements are waiting for you to unlock~

I hope that in this virtual world, you can have a wonderful time with Kaya~
Finally, thank you for reading here, and thank you for experiencing this game, I believe this game will not let you down~

data.short_description: We Bring You The Technology Of The Future: A Digital Girl With A 3A Gaming Experience. She Has A High Degree Of Freedom, Allowing You To Manipulate Her In Any Posture At Will. The Realistic Body Is Flexible. We Have Innovatively Added A Unique Full Control Of The Limbs.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: i5 Or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 Or higher
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: i7 Or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 Or higher
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

data.legal_notice: This game has restricted content (naked leakage). Please abide by the laws and regulations of the country where the player is located. If there is content in the game content that does not comply with the laws and regulations of your country, please stop purchasing and playing this game. The publisher and development team of this game are willing to cooperate with the laws and regulations of your country and fully comply with all the rules of Steam. The game development team is located in Seattle, USA. The establishment, effectiveness, performance, interpretation and dispute resolution of these terms are protected by local laws.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game Contains Naked Leaks And Adult Products, Please Abide By The Laws And Regulations Of Your Country To Buy And Play This Game.
